### Making a vector and checking it out 

```{r}
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)

class(vec_1)

typeof(vec_1)

vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[3]
vec_1_e3

vec_1_e1 <- vec_1[1]
vec_1_e1

vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[5:7]
vec_1_e5to7

vec_1_char <- as.character(vec_1)
vec_1_char
```

### vector 2!

```{r}
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara", location = "Rincon", swell = "south")

class(vec_2)

typeof(vec_2)

vec_2[2]

vec_2["location"]

length(vec_2)

vec_2_e2 <- vec_2[2]
vec_2_e2
```

### Creating a Data frame 

```{r}
df_1 <- data.frame(region = c("A", "B", "A", "D"), 
                   species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "grey whale"), 
                   count = c(12, 2, 36, 6))
df_1

class(df_1)

class(df_1$species)

max_count <- aggregate(count ~ count, data = df_1, max)
max_count

```
